pkgmetadata.longdescription: Nonparametric kernel estimation of the distribution function. Bandwidth selection and estimation of related functions. // Nonparametric kernel distribution function estimation is performed. Three automatic bandwidth selection methods for nonparametric kernel distribution function estimation are implemented: the plug-in of Altman and Leger, the plug-in of Polansky and Baker, and the modified cross-validation of Bowman, Hall and Prvan. The exceedance function, the mean return period and the return level are also computed.
